title: Not sure how I got banned
body: Hello Riot why did I get banned I didn't get an email? I do believe that I was racist

replies.body: This account wasn't banned for any toxic or anything behavior related. It looks like someone attempted to issue a chargeback on purchases through League, which will need to be repaid before the account is unlocked. If you aren't sure what's going on with this, please be sure to reach out to the billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for all the details!
